item.title: Project VII: Predictive Lead Scoring
item.description: State of art What is lead scoring ? In a nutshell, lead scoring is a methodology for ranking leads in order to determine their sales-readiness, their scoring etc. Why lead scoring is so important ? It helps sales and marketing departments identify which prospects are potentially most valuable to the company and its current sales funnel. It helps: improving the lead-handoff process, increasing lead conversion rate, improving rep productivity, and more.
